sentences.sContent: I'm canvassing for the Republican Party.

remMethod.val: can(能) + v(胜利的标志) + ass(驴子) → 能让驴子得胜 → 向…拉选票

trans.tranCn: 细究；彻底检查；向…拉票或拉生意
trans.tranOther: If you canvass for a particular person or political party, you go around an area trying to persuade people to vote for that person or party
